    • parse

      public static net.kyori.adventure.text.Component parse(Object message)
      Parses a string using one of the MiniMessage parsers.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to parse. Will be parsed with the safe parser by default.
      Returns:
      An adventure component from the parsed message.
      See Also:
      • parse(Object, boolean)

    • parse

      public static net.kyori.adventure.text.Component parse(Object message, boolean safe)
      Parses a string using one of the MiniMessage parsers.
      Parameters:
      message - The message to parse.
      safe - Whether only color/decoration/formatting related tags should be parsed.
      Returns:
      An adventure component from the parsed message.

    • parseFromExpressions

      public static List<net.kyori.adventure.text.Component> parseFromExpressions(org.bukkit.event.Event e, Expression<?>... expressions)
      Constructs a list of components from the given expressions.
      Parameters:
      e - The event to get expression values with.
      expressions - The expressions to parse from.
      Returns:
      A list of components parsed from the stringified expressions.
      See Also:
      • parseFromSingleExpression(Event, Expression)

    • parseFromSingleExpression

      public static net.kyori.adventure.text.Component parseFromSingleExpression(org.bukkit.event.Event e, @Nullable Expression<?> expression)
      Constructs a component from the given expression.
      Parameters:
      e - The event to get expression values with.
      expression - The expression to parse from.
      Returns:
      A component parsed from the stringified expression. Will return an empty component if the provided expression is null.
      See Also:
      • parseFromExpressions(Event, Expression[])

    • escape

      public static String escape(String string)
      Escapes all tags known to Skript in the given string.
      Parameters:
      string - The string to escape tags in.
      Returns:
      The string with tags escaped.

    • stripFormatting

      public static String stripFormatting(String string, boolean all)
      Strips all formatting from a string.
      Parameters:
      string - The string to strip formatting from.
      all - Whether ALL formatting/tags should be stripped. If false, only safe tags like colors and decorations will be stripped.
      Returns:
      The stripped string.

    • stripFormatting

      public static String stripFormatting(net.kyori.adventure.text.Component component)
      Strips all formatting from a component.
      Parameters:
      component - The component to strip formatting from.
      Returns:
      A stripped string from a component.

    • toLegacyString

      public static String toLegacyString(String string, boolean all)
      Converts a string into a legacy formatted string.
      Parameters:
      string - The string to convert.
      all - Whether ALL formatting/tags should be converted to a legacy format. If false, only safe tags like colors and decorations will be converted.
      Returns:
      The legacy string.

    • toLegacyString

      public static String toLegacyString(net.kyori.adventure.text.Component component)
      Converts a component into a legacy formatted string.
      Parameters:
      component - The component to convert.
      Returns:
      The legacy string.
